entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this evening then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
